original: intros H a d H0. unfold divide in H0. destruct H0 as [H1 [H2 [H3 | [H4 H5]]]]. - unfold divide. auto. - destruct H. destruct H. destruct H. destruct H4 as [q [H6 H7]]. split. + apply H. split. * apply H1. * apply H2. + right. split. * intro H8. apply H3. rewrite H8 in H1. apply H1. * exists q. split. ++ apply H6. ++ apply H7.
